author: USA TODAY, Jessica Flores, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: Trump set to unveil guidelines for reopening economy amid protests; US deaths near 31K
description: With some Americans beginning to protest amid social distancing restrictions, President Donald Trump is set to share guidelines to reopen the economy.
content:
Social distancing matters. Here is how to do it and how it can help curb the COVID-19 pandemic.
USA TODAY
President Donald Trump is set to speak to all 50 governors on Thursday as protests begin to emerge across the country amid a pandemic that has led to m… [+8273 chars]
